entry.title: High Wind Warning issued January 28 at 4:14AM MST until January 29 at 9:00AM MST by NWS
entry.summary: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...West winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 60 mph. * WHERE...Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County. * WHEN...Until 9 AM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be difficult, especially for lightweight, high profile vehicles.
